songs.title: Stay (Cover)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: All]
Ooh ooh ooh
Ah ooh
Ah ooh
Ooh ooh ooh
Ah ooh
Ah ooh

[Verse 1: Normani & All & Ally]
All along it was a fever (ah ooh, ah ooh)
A cold sweat, hot-headed believer (ah ooh, ah ooh)
I threw my hands in the air and said show me something(ah ooh, ah ooh)
He said, "If you dare come a little closer" (ah ooh, ah ooh)
Round and around and around and around we go
Oh now tell me now tell me now tell me now you know
Mmm

[Chorus: Lauren & (Ally) & [Dinah] All]
Not really sure how to feel about it
Something in the way you move (something in the way you move)
Makes me feel like I can't live without you
And it takes me all the way
[I want you to stay]
I want you to stay

[Bridge: All & Lauren & (Camila) & {Dinah}]
Ooh ooh ooh the reason I hold on (the reason I hold on)
Ooh ooh ooh ooh {’Cause I need this hole gone}
Funny you're the broken one
But I'm the only one who needed saving
Cause when you never see the light
It’s hard to know which one of us is caving

[Chorus: Camila & (Lauren) & {Dinah} & {All}]
Not really sure how to feel about it
Something in the way you move (something in the way you move)
Makes me feel like I can't live without you
And it takes me all the way
({I want you to stay)
Ayy
{I want you to stay} (ayy)
{I want you to stay}
